Blog.post: Atendendo a pedidos eu fiz o bloguinho pra postar minhas piadinhas merdas. HaHaHaHa Eu já postava antes no (falecido) urlLink Aí Pronto , que era o blog d'eu e das minhas primas, como ele morreu eu creii esse. Especialmente para minha irmã Bianca, minhas primas Mata, Maíra, minhas amigas Nath, Déa, Mauça e Raíza e meu amigo Téo, que são quem mais me prestigiam. Dividas naturalmente em categorias, que posso definir como: origem do nome (ex.: Nelito, Rede), duas palavras em uma (ex.: celebridade, marajá), duas palavras (ex.: Felipe Massa, Beth Farias), e outras que não me lembro agora. Ultimamente eu tenho treinado pouco e feito muita merda (como a maioria), mas mesmo assim vai as que eu fiz hoje: Hoje é o aniversário de Juliana, ela celebridade. Você sabia que o Nelito de Celebridades não era pra se chamar Nelito e sim Lito? É porque a mãe dele ia por o nome dele de Lito, ai ela foi registrar o nome e tava com eles nos braços, e o cara do cartório perguntou: - E aí, qual é o nome dele? - É Lito. Lindo esse nome néééééééééééé Lito - Falou a mãe dele apertando suas bochechas. Daí o cara do cartório achou que era Nelito. Foi boa... foi boa... Ouvindo: Pânico na Web
Da aula de biologia... O avestruz espirra e a hematose .
I am so tired of some fuckin people. Disgusting souls is what they are. No more hypocrisy, god, please. It'll be hard to happen, buuuuuut...
I can't wait any longer. I want my digital camera. =/ I'm almost forsking the idea. lol. laughing instead of crying.

I got a good news. I'll have a car next year. =) Even if it was of my grandpa. LOL! It's a begining... =) The next step, after wait to turn 18, is fix, because the car is going to waste. ¯ Laurent Wolf - Saxo

I was looking for some websites about the skolbeats 2004 and all i can say: i'd really really love to be there! In spite of my love for the eletronic music, i have been a little distant of the scene of the e-music. Sometime ago i was involved with the clubber ideology, and i like it, but the main thing of them, the music, it was unkown to me, newsness of course. That's the reason i decided to be informed about the music scene. =) At the irc-channel i could meet people that are friend of mine nowadays, and they're those who let me be informed, and tell me what's happening and what will happen. By the way i have to search for musics that was played there.
launch at a friends house can be a good moment of fun, talking... That's happening now. I'm posting of a pal's cel.

I can't understand the reason i have so many classes and unproductive classes at school. The private school and the vestibular schools is a money network. =/ They increase the (school) testes difficulty then it urge the students to go to "one discipline courses". The most understandable point is: the theachers that work at the school are the owners of that "one discipline courses". Its a synonym of cartel. It's Incomprehensible. Unacceptablbe. ***I don't know the termes assigned to school establishments. If you know pless tell me. All that we can do is study as a crazy scientistes and do eight, nine testes in alternated weekends. This is the worst year for a student live. Fuck. ¯ Oasis - Songbird

When I was taking a show I was thinking... Everytime I make a mistake I have my self to count on. I won't say to me to be what I am, cause I don't know who I am. I just have to live and make mistake, cause mistakes was made to be committed. Now listening :: Oasis - Stand By Me
Multiply, deep. Flaunt, courtesy. Bumpkin, tycoon. Display window, Dudgeon. Oh God. I'm feelin' so [...] Me. No explanation. Shit.
Money has been a problem to me since long time, but now this problem got worst. It is a bad news to me 'cause i'm a materialist person. =/

Hole Mary. I never thought that i'd be studying as much as i'm studying these days. Third year is really difficult and all we (students) get overworked! =/ If i'd study all the school tell us to study, the time to take care of my self, my friends and my family there will be lost. =/ Is really boring and stressful but i have nothing to do even so i have to study. I want this year to come to an end as soon as it can. Luck to me and bad luck to all my competitors.
